job_description: Business Analyst, (C2C) - job post Tech Holding Los Angeles, CA • Remote $45 - $60 an hour -  Part-time, Contract Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Salary $45 - $60 an hour Job Type Part-time Contract About us: Working at Tech Holding isn't just a job, it's an opportunity to be a part of something bigger. We are a full-service consulting firm that was founded on the premise of delivering predictable outcomes and high-quality solutions to our clients. Our founders and team members have industry experience and have held senior positions in a wide variety of companies – from emerging startups to large Fortune 50 firms – and we have taken our combined experiences and developed a unique approach that is supported by the principles of deep expertise, integrity, transparency, and dependability. The Role: We are seeking a Business Analyst to join our team either part-time for a 2-month or 6-month contract preferably (with potential for hire) in Los Angeles County. The successful candidate will have at least 3 years of Business Analyst experience and will be responsible for gathering and documenting business requirements, creating user stories, and work closely with stakeholders. What you will do: Facilitate meetings with stakeholders to gather input, provide updates, and ensure requirements are clearly understood. Work closely with the UX team, engineering, and QA to ensure that product requirements are met and any issues are addressed in a timely manner. Write product requirements independently and work with the team to ensure their successful implementation. Utilize JIRA Software to track progress and communicate with team members. Qualifications At least 3 years of experience as a Business Analyst. Experience gathering and documenting BRDs or creating user stories. Experience with Salesforce Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Experience with JIRA Software. Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, or related field. Nice to Haves: Salesforce experience Healthcare or real estate experience What we offer: Remote Work Opportunities Flexible Work Hours Professional Development Opportunities Expected Compensation $45-$60 Per Hour If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.

Senior Data Analyst - 2439 (No C2C or third parties) - job post Bridgewater Consulting Group 7 reviews Irwindale, CA 91706 • Hybrid remote $51.17 an hour -  Contract Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Salary $51.17 an hour Job Type Contract Position: 2439 - Senior Data Analyst (BA3) Location: Hybrid – Irwindale CA 91706 (Tue & Thurs onsite) As a Senior Data Analyst, you will be the key support for program managers to ensure that both client-led and third-party managed programs receive, analyze, and integrate performance data insights to maximize the effectiveness of a program. You will have accountability over gathering critical program data through various areas, including customer feedback, creating, and tracking dashboards-based metrics, and monthly reports from both 3rd party implementers and internal teams. You will also have accountability over ensuring that trends in this data are correctly reported to both managers and contractors. Outside of data needs, this position will the crucial to the success of assigned programs by supplying Advisors and Senior Advisors with meeting materials based on synthesized insights, as well as taking diligent notes during meetings and summarizing takeaways. Required Skills/Attributes · Bachelor's Degree · Possesses 5 or more years of project support or data analytics experience · Intermediate to Expert proficiency in PowerBI, Excel, Access, SQL, Tableau, and/or other data analytical and visualization tools. Ability to perform detailed analytics by gathering, interpreting, cleansing, and organizing large and complex data sets to inform program effectiveness and efficiency. · 5+ years’ experience with business analysis and extensive analytical skills including internal controls and contract management · 5+ years’ experience supporting process improvements and maintaining service level agreements · Experience providing exceptional service to internal and external customers and stakeholders · Capable of delivering timely and error-free execution of data analysis with minimal support · Capable of drawing correct conclusions by applying analytic results to business situations · Consistently able to synthesize and recommend actionable solutions for own workstream(s) · Detail-oriented and high level of organization · Entrepreneurial mindset with ability to manage competing priorities and deliver results · Strong problem-solving skills with hypothesis driven approach · Working knowledge of IOU-led Energy Efficiency programs, policies, and methodologies · Advanced proficiency with data analysis and performance management · Experience with developing and executing program implementation workplans · Capable of using simple, clear, and high-impact communications materials to enhance effectiveness of communication · Experience in working with cross-functional project teams · Experience with synthesizing data and presenting insights and trends to supervisors and senior stakeholders · Strong interpersonal communication skills and desire to build collaborative partnerships across internal functions Job Type: Contract Pay: $51.17 per hour Benefits: 401(k) Dental insurance Health insurance Vision insurance Schedule: Monday to Friday Education: Bachelor's (Required) Experience:
